arts.ttl: Cataldi promises hospitalized teammate Bove a goal and delivers as Fiorentina wins 8th straight
arts.sum: “I texted him before the match, saying: ‘Watch the game on TV because I’m going to score a goal into the top corner,’” Cataldi said. Danilo Cataldi texted hospitalized Fiorentina teammate Edoardo Bove to say that he would score for him Sunday and then fulfilled his promise in a 1-0 win over Cagliari on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Fiorentina vs. Cagliari, a lunchtime kick-off
arts.sum: No team have picked up fewer points than Cagliari in this Serie A season against opponents currently in the top half of the table (2). Fiorentina are unbeaten in their last seven matches against Cagliari in Serie A (W4 D3), scoring exactly three goals in three of the most recent four.
